claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: Header of a Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR) recommendations and reports, Vol. 71, No. 1, dated August 26, 2022, showing only the title and publication information. The image contains only the publication header with no data or statements regarding mutations in cell- or egg-based flu vaccines, and therefore does not support the claim. Note: Only the report header is visible; no substantive content or data is shown to evaluate the claim.
